H1.text: who is the mother of prince michael jackson. Debbie Rowe

H2.text: who is the mother of prince michael jackson. Elizabeth Taylor

H3.text: who is the mother of prince michael jackson. Joseph Jackson

A4.text: Rowe had a son, Michael Joseph Jackson Jr. (born February 13, 1997, at Cedars-Sinai Medical Center in Los Angeles), who was subsequently nicknamed Prince.

A5.text: She is known for being the second wife of pop musician Michael Jackson, with whom she had two children.
